# sqm-share-link



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property          | Attribute         | Description                                                                    | Type     | Default     |
| ----------------- | ----------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------- | ----------- |
| `programId`       | `program-id`      | The ID of the program that should generate the link.                           | `string` | `undefined` |
| `tooltiplifespan` | `tooltiplifespan` | The number of milliseconds that the tooltip will appear for                    | `number` | `undefined` |
| `tooltiptext`     | `tooltiptext`     | This is shown after someone has successfully copied the link to the clipboard. | `string` | `undefined` |
